评论概述: Cool and comfortable with built in slip
评论详情: Most dresses like this do not come with a built in slip or if they do it is way to tight for the dress. This dress is well made with a lovely rayon or Viscose slip in he skirt. It is cool and comfortable and I will be purchasing another. Wash in cold water and hang to dry. I had no issues with shrinking but I look for the material and know not to put it in the dryer unless you do want it to shrink. That said if you know you’ll be putting it in the dryer buy a size larger. That always works for me. Unfortunately this was not offered any larger than extra large. I have to accommodate my chest so I almost always have to buy a size larger.

This cute little dress runs petite. I love the fabric and the lining...It wrinkles, but the print hides the little wrinkles. If you put it in the dryer you might be sorry. I bought it in a medium, but should have gotten a large.
Super cute dress, nice material and really pretty colors. Got lots of compliments!
Tight in the shoulders and an inch or two too short.
Very cute, flattering. Tight through the chest. No stretch.

Perfect little summer casual dress. Very comfortable, lightweight fabric, pretty patterns and colors. I had to order a second in a different color and I love both dresses. Great for hot weather! Nice and loose, comfy, feminine dress.

I am 5'3, 135lbs and normally wear a size medium. I received and tried on, and felt as thought the medium looks too loose and baggy, so returning and ordering in a small. Very comfortable and flowy though!

评论概述: Not the best quality but it's cute
评论详情: The Dokotoo Summer Casual Boho Floral Dress has a cute style, and the red color is vibrant. However, there were a few aspects that kept it from being a perfect fit for me.  The first thing to note is the length. While it's listed as a mini dress, it falls more like a tunic on me. If you're looking for a dress with more coverage, this might not be the best choice.  The dress also arrived quite wrinkled. While most clothes require some ironing, this one seemed excessively wrinkled from packaging. More substantial fabric or different packaging might help reduce wrinkles.  The overall quality of the dress felt a bit on the lower side. While it's perfectly fine for casual wear, don't expect a super well-made garment.  Considering these factors, I'd rate the Dokotoo dress at 3 stars. It has a cute design, but the short length, excessive wrinkling, and lower quality material hold it back.
Do like the quality of the dress.  Going to use it for Easter. Good price.
This is cute and comfortable & a good fabric. I prefer a simpler sleeve but it’s not a deal breaker.
really unflattering and cheaply made
This dress is perfect. Great material. Fits perfectly and if you’re on the taller side, it’s the perfect length!

评论概述: Cute dress - it brings out the folk singer in me!
评论详情: I don't know why, but every time I put on this dress, it makes me want to pick up my guitar. It's a cute dress, a little shorter than I'd like, but it is the same length as shown on the product pictures, so I can't complain. I ordered it in size medium and it fits as expected.

This dress is a good light material and the pattern looks just as pictured. I am 5’8” and 210 lbs and got the XL. It fits as expected. It is a TAD short. So will have to be careful bending over but i would recommend this dress
Had to return I ordered wrong size.  The dress and fabric was beautiful

This dress is very cute and flattering. I can't wait for the temps to break and remain a consistent warm degree. I love the colors in this dress. It looks rich in person. It is very much so lightweight. It is short so waiting on the summer is only smart. It is a full looking dress. It is short and I really appreciate that because I'm short as well. I think the thing that stands out the most are the colors. I love this dress and can't wait to get it on to go out.

I am 5.5 and weight 160 pounds and pregnant. I got size medium. Tight on the chest and i am small chested so i would say size up if u have larger chest . Other then that i really like the color and the length very cute perfect for summer events . I just wondering how it will wash . Will update once i wash it .
light and airy. Short and flippant.

评论概述: Very cute and flowy bit way too small
评论详情: This is very cute but you absolutely need to size up! I ordered my normal size L and it was wicked tight in the chest. I am 5'6" 160 lbs 38C  usually size 14 or L.  I have found this is a recurring problem with Amazon lately...very disappointed. I had to return it.  I liked the material very lightweight and would pack nicely into little space for traveling.
I usually don’t wear dresses because of my pasty legs, but I’ve finally started getting more into it since I became a girl mom! I love this dress, it’s super lightweight and flowy

This dress is really cute and perfect for summer!  Unfortunately, it was a little too tight through the bust and I had to pass it to my granddaughter.  I purchased the size I normally wear, so I would suggest sizing up one size!

I really like this dress. I threw it in the wash as soon as I got it and it came out perfect. I washed it with like colors on warm and hung to dry with no issues. I live in the Deep South so most of the year I live in dresses like this. Cute, lightweight, flowy, and just above the knee. Whats not to like?

my only complaint is the lack of pockets.  it seems well made and washed well.  There is an extra layer in the skirt to keep it from being seethrough. I think I can wear it without a slip but haven't tested it out in full sunlight to see.  nice colors and fits as expected.  I'm 5'10, 14/16 and the XL was perfect.  A little short on me, but not too short that I won't wear it.

I love a good empire waist. This is an okay empire waist. I'm 5'4, wear a size 12 and a DD cup. There's not a ton of room in the bust area for me. I can wear it, but part of my bust line ends up being below the empire waist. Because it's such a loose dress, people might not notice that, but the empire waist should be a bit cinched but it isn't and that's my my bust is spilling down under the waist line. The A-line shape of the dress is okay, but it would be more flattering if the waist had more shape to it. I will wear this because it does look okay, but this is the kind of dress I will wear when I just want to throw something on and go to the market or something. I wouldn't wear this if I were trying to impress anyone. The cute print helps it a little, so I gave it 4 stars instead of 3.

评论概述: Cute dress, 100% viscose. I ordered this in red and it's pink with too many red flowers.
评论详情: I thought this dress was cute when I saw it online on Amazon, and I spent quite a few minutes trying to decide on which color I wanted to order. I finally settled on red, which is really pink with far too many red flowers for my taste. I used Dokotoo's size chart, and the top of the dress is too tight, while the rest of it is loose.  This is really a baby doll dress updated for 2024, but the fit in mine is way off, and I can't wear it out of the house. The tight top of the dress shows all of my bra, and I've tried this with several different bras. It never changes. When I saw the fabric the dress is made of when it arrived, I wasn't happy with what I saw. The dress is pink with red flowers, as in the listing picture, but the red flowers are everywhere, much too busy a pattern for me.  I like the way this dress is made, a swing dress or a baby doll dress, but there's a little too much fabric on the bottom of the dress and too little on the top of the dress to suit me. I can't wear this out of my home because the top part of the dress is skin-tight. This also makes it very hard to take this off and put it on over my head.  In the top of the listing information, we're told the dress is machine washable, but further down we're told it's hand wash only in 30-degree water or less and hang it to dry or line dry it.  This dress is a very disappointing product as far as how it fits (doesn't fit, really) so tight in the top that it shows every bit of your bra, and I did try a few bras with this. The bottom of the dress is flowing and is sort of a swing dress. The fabric doesn't look anything like the listing pictures in person, which can happen to anyone, but it looks cheap in person.  I can't recommend this dress because there are too many inconsistencies in it. It's too tight at the top but is very loose and flowing on the bottom of the dress. The fabric is cheap, 100% viscose, and it's very loud and busy with red flowers all over the pink fabric it's made in. Also, I don't like to see products advertised in the top of the listing information as machine washable, but then further down their information tells you it's hand wash only, line or hang dry. Overall, this is a disappointment because it's not well made and is something I'd never wear outside my home.

The dress was cute and flowy and perfect for summer. I ordered the pink, and the pattern was bright and gorgeous. It looked exactly like the picture when I pulled it out of the box.  My only complaint is that the dress is a little smaller than I expected in the bust area. I'll wear it, but I'll size up for my next one.  If you want a cute, simple dress for summer with a nice air flow, I recommend picking one of these up.

I ordered this dress in small, I am 5"3 and 130lbs for size reference. This dress is definitely true to size. I really like the length, it fits just above my knees, that is the perfect length for me. The fabric is very lightweight and soft, the perfect summer dress. It comes with a second layer so it is not see through. I really like the fit of the sleeves, tailored fit. One thing that could be a concern is the bust area. I wear a size A cup so it fits me good, but definitely a snug fit. You could try sizing up but this dress fits as pictured, The hip area is very flowy so if you wear a bigger size it might give an unflattering look. Overall a versatile summer dress, easy to dress up with heels or for a casual look with sandals.

This is such an adorable dress! The material feels so soft and flowy and with the small pattern is very feminine. I like the fact that it has a high waist (A-Line) for a slimmer look. I also like the cut of the dress and since it's supposed to be a mini dress, it actually comes up above my knees. At five feet tall, usually dresses look a little too long on me, but not this one. The draw string adds a nice touch and it looks good left loose or tied. The dress looks great with a pair of sandals, sneakers or even with a pair of fun boots! I washed the dress in cold water, delicate cycle and dried it in my dryer and it held up well and it didn't come out wrinkled either. However, the reason why I'm not giving this dress five stars is because there' a little too much material around the waist. I ordered my regular size and it fits a little too big on me. I would have preferred it if it wasn't so loose fitting.
